languages.text: The user suffers −10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from any source until the end of combat. After the combat ends, the user suffers 1 random {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.
languages.original_text: Любой {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, получаемый персонажем до конца боя, уменьшается на 10. После завершения боя персонаж получает 1 случайную {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травму{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The user suffers −10 damage from any source until the end of combat. After the combat ends, the user suffers 1 random trauma.

Любой урон, получаемый персонажем до конца боя, уменьшается на 10. После завершения боя персонаж получает 1 случайную травму.

languages.text: 使用者受到的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低10点，效果持续至战斗结束。战斗结束之后，使用者随机获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: The user suffers −10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from any source until the end of combat. After the combat ends, the user suffers 1 random {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者受到的所有伤害降低10点，效果持续至战斗结束。战斗结束之后，使用者随机获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}效果。

languages.text: 使用者は戦闘終了時まであらゆるソースからの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を−10受ける。戦闘終了後、使用者はランダムな{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}を1受ける。
languages.original_text: The user suffers −10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from any source until the end of combat. After the combat ends, the user suffers 1 random {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘終了時まであらゆるソースからのダメージを10受ける。戦闘終了後、ランダムに{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}トラウマ{/g}が1付与される。

languages.text: El usuario sufre −10 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de cualquier tipo hasta el final del combate. Al terminar el combate, el usuario sufre 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g} al azar.
languages.original_text: The user suffers −10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from any source until the end of combat. After the combat ends, the user suffers 1 random {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El usuario sufre −10 de daño de cualquier tipo hasta el final del combate. Al terminar el combate, el usuario sufre 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g} al azar.

languages.text: Der Nutzer erleidet bis zum Ende des Kampfes −10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aus einer beliebigen Quelle. Nach dem Ende des Kampfes erleidet der Benutzer 1 zufälliges {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g}.
languages.original_text: The user suffers −10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from any source until the end of combat. After the combat ends, the user suffers 1 random {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Nutzer erleidet bis zum Ende des Kampfes -10 Schaden aus einer beliebigen Quelle. Nach dem Ende des Kampfes erleidet der Benutzer 1 zufälliges {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g}.

languages.text: L'utilisateur subit −10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, quelle que soit la source, jusqu'à la fin du combat. À l'issue du combat, il subit 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g} aléatoire.
languages.original_text: The user suffers −10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from any source until the end of combat. After the combat ends, the user suffers 1 random {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur subit -10 points de dégâts, quelle que soit la source, jusqu'à la fin du combat. À l'issue du combat, il subit 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g} aléatoire.

languages.text: Kullanıcının her türlü kaynaktan aldığı {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g}, 10 puan azalır. Etkisi, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Kullanıcı, çatışma sona erdiğinde rastgele 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travmaya{/g} maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: The user suffers −10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from any source until the end of combat. After the combat ends, the user suffers 1 random {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.
